# Software

| __`metabias`__ (co-creator and former maintainer) \hfill `metabias.io`
|    R packages for bias-corrections for meta-analysis (`multibiasmeta`, `phacking`, `PublicationBias`)
|    Interactive visualizations and tools

| __Wordbank__ (co-creator and maintainer) \hfill `wordbank.stanford.edu`
|    Open repository of parent-report data on children's early language learning <!--\hfill `github.com/langcog/wordbank`-->
|    Interactive visualizations and tools <!--\hfill `github.com/langcog/wordbank-shiny`-->
|    R package for data access and manipulation (`wordbankr`) <!--\hfill `github.com/langcog/wordbankr`-->

| __childes-db__ (co-creator and maintainer) \hfill `childes-db.stanford.edu`
|    Flexible and reproducible interface to CHILDES, a corpus of child language transcripts <!--\hfill `github.com/langcog/childes-db`-->
|    R package for data access (`childesr`) <!--\hfill `github.com/langcog/childesr`-->

| __Peekbank__ (co-creator and maintainer) \hfill `peekbank.stanford.edu`
|    Flexible and reproducible interface to developmental eyetracking datasets <!--\hfill `github.com/langcog/peekbank`-->
|    R package for data access (`peekbankr`) <!--\hfill `github.com/langcog/peekbankr`-->

| __Wordful__ (co-creator and former maintainer) \hfill `wordfulapp.com`
|    Smartphone app for tracking early vocabulary growth

| __MetaLab__ (co-creator and former maintainer) \hfill `metalab.stanford.edu`
|    Interactive tools for community-augmented meta-analysis in cognitive development research

| __`rwebppl`__ (co-creator and former maintainer) \hfill `github.com/mhtess/rwebppl`
|    R interface to the WebPPL probabilistic programming language

| __`jglmm`__ (creator and maintainer) \hfill `github.com/mikabr/jglmm`
|    R package for fitting generalized linear fixed effects models in Julia

| __`ggpirate`__ (creator and maintainer) \hfill `github.com/mikabr/ggpirate`
|    R package for making plots of data with categorical independent variables

| __`tidyboot`__ (co-creator and maintainer) \hfill `github.com/langcog/tidyboot`
|    R package for doing tidyverse-compatible bootstrapping
